title: S3 Ep17: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Episode 10 – Mafia

description:
September 10, 2018 / Investigators look into Donnie Barrentine's history and potential ties to the murders at Rising Daughter Baptist Church.

Episode scoring music by Blue Dot Sessions, Patrick Cortes, and Chris Zabriskie.

This episode was sponsored by Pretty Litter and SimpliSafe.
